ModMetaData.name: Shuttle Start for Rich Explorer
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
This patch mod exchanges the Rich Explorer scenario's drop pod approach with a start that has the explorer standing expectantly near their shuttle after exhausting its fuel to reach the location. Nothing else in the Rich Explorer scenario is altered by this mod. For the most exemplary exploratory experience, I exhort you to start near ancient buildings to extract chemfuel expediently to begin your exploits.
